channel.title: github on A blog by st3v3nhunt
channel.description: Recent content in github on A blog by st3v3nhunt

item.title: Use personal Slack for GitHub notifications
item.description: GitHub is a pretty decent cloud based Git repository. I would put it in my top 2 along with GitLab.

item.title: How I work with Git
item.description: I really enjoy introducing people to Git. Pretty much without fail they see how much better their development work-flow can be and find their work more enjoyable as a result.
